sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { AreaService } from '../area.service'; import { Area } from 'area'; @Component({ selector: 'app-areas', templateUrl: './areas.component.html', styleUrls: ['./areas.component.css'], }) export class AreasComponent { areas: Area[] = []; constructor(private areaService: AreaService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getAreas(); } getAreas(): void { this.areaService.getAreas().subscribe((areas) => (this.areas = areas)); } }
